column1: Uchi////Great for omakase deal! Sushi was really fresh and good quality. The service was also excellent! Very attentive staff. The only reason for one star got taken off on this review is the ambience was too loud and the restaurant was over cramped up with customers. Also
column2: despite having a reservation but we were not seated until more than half of the party presented. Therefore
column3: while waiting for friends to arrive
column4: we all had to stand around at the bar area for drinks
column5: and we constantly got bumped into by waitstaff and other customers.
